fullText: This new musical about racial tensions in Civil War-era New York has admirable intentions but feels overstuffed and unfocused, despite some stirring performances.
dtliExcerpt: This new musical about racial tensions in Civil War-era New York has admirable intentions but feels overstuffed and unfocused, despite some stirring performances.
